TypeSignature.Value: public interface IWatchable : Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable
.class public interface auto ansi abstract IWatchable implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
type IWatchable = interface interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: An object that may be registered with a watch service so that it can be watched for changes and events.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
